title: House for Rent / Se Renta Casa
posting_body: House for Rent on6931 Foxwoods Drive Schereville, IN 46375
$2,950.00 monthly payment plus one month rent security deposit
It has 4 bedrooms, 3 bathroom, kitchen, dining room, living room, two car attached garage, large fenced backyard with swimming pool, and is in a great neighborhood with excelled school township.
If interested, feel free to call 219-746-8830.
